doc.title: Lyric DVD Magazine Vol. 2
doc.plot: Lyric DVD Magazine has returned with an explosive second issue, which explores deep within the realm of Reggae/Dancehall music and culture. Boasting never-scene-before footage and a host of exclusives, Lyric DVD's latest edition is guaranteed to keep viewers on the edges of their seats. The new release boasts the first recorded interview with Jah Cure since his incarceration; footage of the late "Dancehall Queen" Shanique Taylor and gripping candid moments with the late Bogle. In addition to these rock solid features, the issue is also laced with interviews and often unprompted sessions with several of Dancehall's favorite celebrities, videos and much more. This fully loaded issue has a unique format, which will provide viewers with a well-rounded Dancehall experience.
